hopobject.name: VSCP
hopobject.body: VSCP & Friends is a framwork for (home)automation and control. The package is working on the Beaglebone today also but users need to compile the code themselves today.  A turnrekey package is on the way in a few weeks. With this package nice web user interfaces can be created with a few lines of code where the widgets ciommunicate with the VSCP daemon using HTML5 websockets. Use with Tllestick, 1-Wire sensor or whatever.
hopobject.shortdesc: VSCP & Friends is a framework for automation. I am working on an installation package for Beaglebone
